issue.title: [Python] In place development builds do not have a __version__
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-992](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-992). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With release tags possibly being in branches, we need to come up with some more robust solution for this as well.

comments.body:
